name: HUNTER (2019)
description:
This is the project I'm working on days and nights! But this is a work of love!

Hunter is a gigantic and sexy Action-Rpg.

You are a Demon's hunter who explore a NON LINEAR big world with various environments (Automn, Winter, Canyon, Desert, Mystic forest...) and search for the 30 lovely sexy gals in Anime Style you can meet in the game.

Full of Easter eggs to uncover. Alternate paths to discover.

Hunter aims to surprise you by introducing constant change and a lot of ideas like some of the 30 sexy characters who can join your team and more surprises but I can't say too much about it for maximum surprise effect.Plug your xbox controller before to run the game.

If you don't have pad, the keyboard is available too. to shoot use Fire or Ctrl if keyboard.
